detailsOfAchievement: We basically would like to support Orphan children. We will help them to become high achievers in the society and ease burden on local and national government, by providing standard education and other supporting needs required. Viz. Decent accommodation, nutritious food, best health care, extra curricular activities , personality development and health.It ensures that children individually from early age to develop their own potential and required strengths for future career.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Initial expenditure was donated by M Karanam. Naren Karanam: A prime Trustee cum settlor living in USA is going to support the charity with overseas funding once FCRA permission is granted. One of the ways he chose to give something back to the society.

Initial seeding fund was donated by Trustee Muralidhar Karanam for registering Charity and establishing the orphanage with the anticipation of funds from Naren Karanam who lives in USA and prime planner of this orphanage giving best education and ensuring overall development of the admitted destitute children in our organisation

Food Security and NRM based agriculture related projects in 15 mandals covering 30,000 farmers and women. 4. â€˜Integrated Watershed Development programs and covered around 13600 hectares of land in 6 mandals and drought proof programs in around 20 mandals and 210 villages 5. . Health, Sanitation and Housing programs: in 35 mandals. We have constructed low cost around 5060 low cost houses for the poor, homeless, needy people and widow women in 320 rural villages and around 4250 low cost toilets in 215 villages in two districts. 8.
